name: Old Man With a Shovel
description:
You're two tiles long and you can move boxes.

Features:

  • Musical track
  • 31 levels
  • Very intuitive movement
  • You can't see your character through walls(most of the time)

Controls:

Isometric movement with keyboard is a bad idea. You can choose control layout in settings.

  • WASD to move and QE to rotate
  • QWAS to move and ZX to rotate
  • 7913 to move and 46 to rotate(don't forget num lock)
  • 4512 to move and QE to rotate(suggested by my friend and named after him)
